name: Safe Robber 3
description:
Our friend the robber often dreams about being a giant, but even in dreams cannot resist robbing safes! While in this oneiric state, he grabs the houses and shakes them until the safes fall out.

Controls

Move: Arrow keys, WASD, controller sticks or D-pad
Undo: Z, controller East button
Reset: R, controller North button (resets are undoable)
Exit house with ESC
